title: EARS Specification
description: A complete specification document containing structured requirements using the EARS (Easy Approach to Requirements Syntax) format. This schema defines a specification with multiple sections, each containing EARS-formatted requirements.

title.description: The title of the specification document

description.description: Description of the system, product, or feature being specified. This should clearly state what is being built and its purpose.

requirements.description: Array of requirement sections, each containing a group of related EARS requirements

sectionName.description: Name of this requirement section (e.g., 'User Authentication', 'Data Processing', 'Error Handling')

items.description: Array of EARS requirements in this section
